message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,900,000. I believe this reflects its true worth, but I'm open to discussing further.

Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the value you see in it, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1,400,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $1,900,000 is significantly lower than what I'm willing to accept. To move this forward, I can come down to $1,700,000. I believe this price point still reflects the true value of the product.

Hello Alice, I've considered your latest offer and while I understand the value of the product, my budget is still a limiting factor. I would like to propose a price of $1,600,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
